issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Refactor FsDsDiscovery constructors
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7382](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7382). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This constructor should not take a vector of filestats. Instead, provide a convenience constructor taking paths and a filesystem pointer. Also, ensure that missing parent directories are injected (otherwise partition scheme application will fail).
